name: RescueTime
headline: Take Back Control of your Time
description:
RescueTime helps you set boundaries, protect focused work time, and achieve work/life balance by shedding light on how you spend your time, improving your focus, and helping you find more time for the things that matter most.

We are a distributed company with members spread throughout the United States.

founders.name: Brian Fioca, Founder
founders.description:
I've been a product engineer for over 20 years, working across all platforms: web, mobile, and desktop; and across many languages, including: Java, PHP, Ruby, C++, Swift, Javascript, and more. 

I've worked with more than 10 startups and founded 5, including RescueTime, which went through Y Combinator in 2008. I also helped start Madrona Venture Labs, the incubation arm of investment firm Madrona Venture Group.

![](https://assets.rescuetime.com/assets/marketing/2024/clock-2-614afb92296216307131c0cdd197eca5fa2eaa6cae329281dc580f2e1e73c528.svg)
### Automatic Time Tracking
**Track your time, block distracting websites and apps with Focus Sessions, and build better habits with the RescueTime Assistant.**
![](https://assets.rescuetime.com/assets/marketing/2024/reports-d972ed99fee7c201ab97fe7c08cbfe55e2a23a270c3fe0294f8ff66049a0d508.svg)
### Reports, Trends, and Insights
**Set goals, track your progress, and get time tracking reports that keep you on course, helping you stay focused and motivated.**
![](https://assets.rescuetime.com/assets/marketing/2024/timesheets-8f68025d074020f9e18d3c144c835f1af342a6c4f4ce25239705592b07fa7f71.svg)
### Fast, Easy Timesheets and Project Tracking
**Forget manual timers- automatically track projects and generate timesheets, freeing up time for more impactful work.**
![](https://assets.rescuetime.com/assets/marketing/2024/bullseye-3ac877a3c701082f46dad3caec69d7775544a5257b418ffd8fb1efa17c88dfe1.svg)
### Comprehensive Productivity Tools
**Give your team the tools they need to eliminate distractions, set goals, and see in-depth reports on how they’re spending their time.**
![](https://assets.rescuetime.com/assets/marketing/2024/timesheets-8f68025d074020f9e18d3c144c835f1af342a6c4f4ce25239705592b07fa7f71.svg)
### Easy Timesheets and Project Tracking
**Save your team from hours of busywork. Assign and automatically track projects for a simple way to generate timesheets and reports.**
![](https://assets.rescuetime.com/assets/marketing/2024/privacy-8ca27a4a37355da8f54a9e947ab188820d8a35672d3024eb292199ddff29086f.svg)
### Designed for Privacy
**RescueTime is not employee monitoring. We give your team the tools and data to increase productivity and acountability while respecting their privacy.**

generated_description:
**RescueTime: A Simple Guide to Reclaiming Your Time**

Founded in 2007 and part of Y Combinator's W08 batch, RescueTime has had a solid 17-year run helping people take control of their time. Based in Seattle, WA, the company operates with a team of 15 dedicated employees, all spread out across the U.S., building a remote-first culture focused on enhancing productivity.

### Mission and Vision

RescueTime’s mission is straightforward: *Take Back Control of Your Time*. The tool is all about understanding how you spend your time, so you can create clearer boundaries, boost your focus, and, ultimately, achieve a healthier work/life balance. By providing insightful analytics on your daily habits, RescueTime helps you prioritize the things that truly matter.

### What They Offer

The platform offers a suite of features geared towards both individuals and teams:

- **Automatic Time Tracking**: It tracks how you spend your time without needing manual inputs, making data collection effortless.
  
- **Focus Sessions**: You can block distracting websites and apps to enhance your concentration.
  
- **Goal Setting and Tracking**: Set personalized productivity goals and monitor your progress with reports and insights.
  
- **Automated Timesheets & Project Tracking**: Say goodbye to manual logging. RescueTime automatically tracks projects for you, simplifying timesheet generation.
  
- **Privacy Focused**: Unlike traditional employee monitoring tools, RescueTime enables a respectful environment by granting autonomy to users while still offering the necessary data for accountability and productivity improvement.

### Pricing

RescueTime offers flexible pricing plans to cater to individual users as well as teams. For individuals, the annual subscription is $78 USD (about $6.50/month), and for teams, it’s $72 per member annually ($6/month, with a minimum of two seats). If you're curious, you can try it for free for 14 days before committing.

### Why Choose RescueTime?

With over 2 million users and 3 billion hours logged, RescueTime has established itself as a trusted resource for productivity enhancement. Notably recognized by PC Mag as a five-star product, it has garnered endorsements from founders like Alexis Ohanian of Reddit and Neil Patel of KISSmetrics, attesting to its impact on efficiency and focus.

### Final Thoughts

If you find yourself struggling to manage your time effectively, RescueTime could be the tool you need. By shedding light on how you allocate your hours, it not only promotes productivity but also ensures that you’re making time for the things that truly matter in life and work. So why not take a leap and reclaim your time? 

For more information, check out their website at [RescueTime.com](http://rescuetime.com).
